thread.title: Phyllis Davis
thread.title_full: HelloFresh US reviewed by Phyllis Davis

author: Phyllis Davis
title: Phyllis Davis
text: We're busy Seniors with full lives and having fresh healthy food is important to us. Hello Fresh saves us both time and money and offers us an opportunity to learn to cook a wide variety of food with fresh fruits, vegetables, meats, fish and chicken. It's amazing how stuck in a rut we had been cooking recipes we'd used for years. Now we're enjoying new flavors and dishes each week. Plus, no more shopping for ingredients! Every week is a new adventure. We turn on the music and enjoy our 30 minutes in the kitchen to prepare our meals.
